name: 3 DayZ Of Horror
description:
3 DayZ Of Horror is a deep-exploration game. Your life depends on survival, Find your self loot, explore further throughout the woods. Or even cause chaos. 3 DayZ Of Horror is a survival horror based game. The storyline is that you are lost in a forest and you have lost your child. You try to find your child, however on the way you need to collect loot and weaponry to exterminate anything that blocks your path! This could be zombies, monsters, enemy ai, and much more to come! When the game is more developed you will have 3 days in game and 3 hours in real life to find your child before he is mauled to death by zombies!

The early access version of the game is out!

Free copies for reviews are a thing. If you would like to review 3 DayZ Of Horror you must have at least 10 thousand followers/subscribers. Add me on discord at: Houxty#1864 for inquiries.

The game is in heavy development and we do not recommend buying the game unless you are willing to experience A LOT of bugs and glitches!
